text.config.chattools.title: Config ChatTools
§6* Might not work in some servers.
text.config.chattools.option.matchSelfNa:
For example, if your nickname is Foo, 
then messages containing Foo will be matched.
text.config.chattools.option.ignoreSyste:
§6* Not recommended to be enabled in servers, 
§6especially those with chat plugins installed 
(unexpected errors may occur).
text.config.chattools.option.toastNotify:
§6* In-development feature, may not work. 
§rWhen Minecraft is running in the background, you will be alerted 
with a Toast Notification when you receive a concern message.
text.config.chattools.option.highlightSe:
Please use "&" for color code prefix, and "\&" for "&".
 
- Enforce Overwriting:
Enabling this feature will make the text that was interactive non-interactive, 
but allows you to apply custom color codes in the custom prefix; 
Disabling this feature will prevent you from applying custom color codes 
in the custom prefix for the prefix that follows it, but the interactivity 
of the text will remain unchanged.
Please use "&" for color code prefix, and "\&" for "&".

Enabling this feature will make the text that was interactive non-interactive, 
but allows you to apply custom color codes in the custom prefix; 
Disabling this feature will prevent you from applying custom color 
codes in the custom prefix for the prefix that follows it, but the interactivity 
of the text will remain unchanged.
key.chattools.toast.title: Message from Minecraft:
text.config.chattools.option.allowList.@:
Will match following inputs.
RegEx is supported.
text.config.chattools.option.banList.@To:
Will not match following inputs.
RegEx is supported.
text.config.chattools.option.injectorEna: Chat injector allows you to automatically add prefixes, suffixes, etc.
